title: Setting Up the Lamps and Dedication of the Levites
summary: Numbers 8 describes the lighting of the tabernacle lamps and the purification and dedication of the Levites for service. It also clarifies that Levites serve from age 25 to 50.

faq.question: What was the role of the lamps?
faq.answer: They illuminated the tabernacle and symbolized God's presence and guidance.

faq.question: How were the Levites dedicated?
faq.answer: They were cleansed, shaved, and presented as a wave offering to the Lord.
